title: Coal - global proved reserves by type 2010 to 2018
summary: The statistic shows a forecast for the reserves global of by type head mounted displays worldwide proved 2018 to 2010 .
For 2012 , global proved by type 2010 displays is forecast to reach 3.99 billion U.S. dollars .

The entire VR market is set to grow at a very fast rate in the following years , especially the software segment , where revenues proved by type software are forecast to reach an over three thousand percent increase in four years .
gold: This statistic represents proved coal reserves worldwide between 2010 to 2018 , by type.
In 2018 , global proved reserves of anthracite and bituminous coal amounted to around 735 billion metric tons.
As of 2018 , the life years of coal is predicted to be a about 132 years at the current rate of production .
